channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Ces lunettes remplacent votre TV : XREAL dévoile les 1S au CES 2026 qui intègrent une compatibilité native avec la Switch 2
item.description: C'est devenu une tradition au CES : XREAL sort une nouvelle paire de lunettes. Cette année, place aux XREAL 1S. Ne cherchez pas la révolution, c'est une évolution chirurgicale : 1200p, plus de luminosité et une compatibilité native avec la Switch 2.

item.title: This robot companion is a cameraman for your pet
item.description: For a long time, tech companies have pitched pet cameras as a way to find out what your furball is up to when you're not home. Vex, a new robot companion launched at CES this week, takes that a step further: it follows your pet around, filming as it goes, and uses AI smarts to […]

item.title: Samsung lance son téléviseur Micro RGB de 130 pouces au CES 2026
item.description: Le géant coréen présente le plus grand écran Micro RGB jamais conçu mêlant nouvelle technologie d’affichage et design inspiré des galeries d'art.

item.title: 01net morning : test du Poco F8 Pro, Starlink abaisse ses satellites, les 20 voitures électriques de 2026
item.description: Bonjour à tous, voici la matinale de 01net ! Qu’avez-vous manqué ce week-end ? Retrouvez toute l’actu à connaitre pour démarrer la semaine du bon pied !

item.title: LG W6 : le retour du « Wallpaper » OLED, une feuille de 9 mm qui cache une bête de course
item.description: C'est probablement le téléviseur le plus impressionnant visuellement de ce CES 2026. La LG OLED evo W6 reprend le concept du "papier peint" abandonné en 2020. En gros, c'est un écran de 77 ou 83 pouces collé au mur, sans aucun câble visible, piloté par un boîtier sans fil.

item.title: Philips 55OLED910 : ce TV 4K Ambilight noté 9/10 s’affiche à prix cassé en 2026
item.description: Ambilight sur quatre côtés, dalle META OLED très lumineuse, expérience gaming ultra-fluide... Il ne manque pas grand-chose au TV Philips 55OLED910, que nous avons testé et validé. En ce début d'année, on le trouve à 1 485 euros au lieu de 1 900 euros chez Ubaldi.

item.title: Samsung’s Freestyle+ projector hands-on: Much brighter and impressively adaptable
item.description: Samsung announced its newest portable projector ahead of its First Look showcase at CES 2026, but you might have been a little confused as to what’s changed. The company says the Freestyle+ is nearly twice as bright as the 2022 Freestyle projector, rated at 230 ISO lumens, which was pretty underwhelming. The new Freestyle+ can output at 430 ISO lumens. If this is the first you’re hearing of ISO Lumens, it’s an internationally standardized rating for projectors, intended to standardize manufacturers' claims of brightness. It still looks very similar to its predecessors, with 160 degrees of rota...

item.title: Samsung brought an absolute beast of a 130-inch Micro RGB TV to CES 2026
item.description: Amid endless AI hype and a guest visit from the CEO of Hartford Steam Boiler (?!), Samsung had a big surprise for us tonight at CES 2026: A massive 130-inch Micro RGB TV. It’s so large, it’s suspended by a large metal stand that surrounds the entire screen, which also lets you tilt the screen just a bit. (For the Samsung diehards, it’s basically a reinvention of its “timeless gallery” stand from 2013.) I imagine bringing this TV home would be like Bart Simpson adopting his beloved elephant Stampy: Your pets would be terrified, and your family would probably be annoyed at this television domi...

item.title: These laws will change how you work in 2026
item.description: President Trump’s second term has already taken a toll on workers. But state legislation on paid leave, AI in hiring, and the minimum wage continues to help bolster workers’ rights. With President Trump back in the White House, this year has brought a barrage of executive orders and edicts that target workers. Trump reduced the minimum wage for federal contractors, made major cuts to the Occupational Safety and Health Administration—whose express mission is to keep people safe in the workplace—and attempted to undermine collective bargaining rights for federal workers. He has also, of course,...

item.title: CES 2026: This knife has a secret party trick. It vibrates when you cut with it.
item.description: Would you use a vibrating knife? Mashable tried the Seattle Ultrasonics C-200 UltraSonic Chef's Knife at CES 2026 Sunday.

item.title: Tineco revient avec du lourd en 2026 : voici les deux nouveaux aspirateurs lavants
item.description: Tineco, marque leader des balais laveurs, vient de présenter deux nouveaux modèles au CES 2026. Tandis que l'un est un monstre de puissance haut de gamme, l'autre mise sur l'aspect pratique, grâce à son design pliable qui lui permet de passer facilement sous les meubles et de se ranger dans les espaces exigus.

item.title: Samsung Music Studio 5 and 7 hands-on: Unique speaker designs debut at CES 2026
item.description: In addition to its annual soundbar updates, Samsung debuted two new home speakers at CES 2026. The Music Studio 5 and 7 are Bluetooth and Wi-Fi units designed to blend in with your home decor thanks to their minimalist look. They certainly don’t look like your typical speakers, and Samsung has packed them with features that it says will ensure optimal sound quality from each one. The Music Studio 5 has a four-inch woofer and two tweeters, and a sound profile that’s optimized by AI Dynamic Bass Control. The design is an interesting interplay between a circle and a square, but the speaker delive...

item.title: The LG C6 OLED TV comes in two versions, and one's way better than the other — here's what you need to know
item.description: The C6 and the C6H have two very important differences

item.title: Samsung's new flagship OLED TV has a secret simultaneous upgrade and downgrade
item.description: The Samsung S95H OLED TV has a step back for some, but an improvement for others

item.title: Birdbuddy’s new smart feeders aim to make spotting birds easier, even for beginners
item.description: Birdbuddy is introducing two new smart bird feeders: the flagship Birdbuddy 2 and the more compact, cheaper Birdbuddy 2 Mini aimed at first-time users and smaller outdoor spaces. Both models are designed to be faster and easier to use than previous generations, with upgraded cameras that can shoot in portrait or landscape and wake instantly […]

item.title: Moon phase today: What the moon will look like on January 5
item.description: See the moon phase expected for January 5, 2025 as well as when the next full moon is expected.

item.title: Hurdle hints and answers for January 5, 2026
item.description: Hints and answers to today's Hurdle all in one place.

item.title: Samsung HW-QS90H soundbar hands-on: Impressive bass performance without a subwoofer
item.description: We’re used to Samsung updating its Q990 soundbar at CES every year, and 2026 is no different. However, the company also debuted the HW-QS90H: a new all-in-one option that Samsung says won’t require a standalone subwoofer due to its Quad Bass Woofer system. The QS90H offers 7.1.2-channel audio with 13 total drivers. Before the show properly kicks off, we got to listen to the new soundbar for a quick judge of its merits. The first thing I noticed about the QS90H is its impressive bass performance. Most of the time when a company claims its soundbar doesn’t need a subwoofer, that proves to be unt...
